domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @realDonaldTrump The coronavirus happened, idiot.  It's not anyone's fault. Now your prodigiously flawed response--that's different. Your incompetence has been astounding. Your efforts to find a scapegoat in order to provide cover for your impotence is despicable. Your party's greed, ridiculous.
